      Methods in GTTM_Analyser with parameters of type GrammarContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks how well a given EventStream fits the Prolongational branching type structure.

      Constructs a map of Beat objects against Event objects.
      double RatingsGenerator.obtainCadenceRating(GrammarContainer grammar, EventStream stream)
      Generates a rating to indicate how well the EventStream fits the grammar structure cadence constraints.
      double RatingsGenerator.obtainGroupingStructureRating(GrammarContainer grammar, EventStream stream)
      Designed to test a piece of music against a grammar to see how well it fits the grouping structure constraints of the grammar.
      double RatingsGenerator.obtainMetricalRating(GrammarContainer grammar, EventStream stream)
      Generates a rating of how well a given EventStream fits the GrammarContainer structure based on the MetricalStructure analysis rules.
      double RatingsGenerator.obtainProlongationalReductionRating(GrammarContainer grammar, EventStream stream)
      Generates a rating of how well a given EventStream fits the GrammarContainer structure based on the ProlongationalReductionAnalyser analysis rules.
      double RatingsGenerator.obtainRating(GrammarContainer grammar, EventStream stream)
      Used to provide an overall rating indicating how well a given EventStream object fits the grammar given by the GrammarContainer object.
      double RatingsGenerator.obtainTimeSpanReductionRating(GrammarContainer grammar, EventStream stream)
      Generates a rating of how well a given EventStream fits the GrammarContainer structure based on the TimeSpanReductionAnalyser analysis rules.

      java.util.List<java.util.Map<Beat,Key>> PitchGenerator.getCandidatePitchChains(GrammarContainer grammar, Scale localScale)
      This method employs the time-span reduction and prolongational reduction preference rules in order to generate a list of maps, where each map constitutes one possible set of pitch events within a piece of music.
